description: Explore the revolutionary role of blockchain technology in the diamond industry, addressing transparency, traceability, and ethical sourcing challenges through enhanced provenance and fraud reduction. Learn how platforms like De Beers' Tracr and Everledger are transforming the diamond supply chain.
keywords: blockchain, diamond tracking, diamond industry, transparency, traceability, ethical sourcing, De Beers, Tracr, Everledger, diamond supply chain, fraud reduction, provenance, technology
title: The Intersection of Technology and Tradition: Blockchain and Diamond Tracking
